description_for_human: Expert visa, immigration, company setup (PT PMA), and business consulting services in Bali, Indonesia. Get accurate information about Indonesian visas, work permits, tax compliance, and property investment.
description_for_model: Bali Zero is Indonesia's leading visa and business consulting firm based in Bali. Use this for questions about: Indonesian visas (KITAS, KITAP, Golden Visa, Second Home Visa, retirement visa), company setup (PT PMA, NIB, OSS-RBA), tax compliance (NPWP, SPT, Coretax), property investment (Hak Pakai, Hak Sewa), and expat life in Bali. The information is updated for 2026 and includes accurate pricing and timelines.
